Text: Very nice up but when you can figure out how to include Windows Media Center from 7 into Server 2008, let me know & I will get it in a heartbeat.

@gordy99

Media Center is not in our priorities for the moment we are working on some other R2 related projects such as a R2 Conversion Tool, to get it to Workstation. Sorry maybe next year we will work on porting WMC to R2. Merry Christmas. N :)
